contentrichtext.text: {{selfref|On Wikipedia, CENT may refer to [[Wikipedia:CENT|Centralized discussions]].}} {{wiktionarypar|cent|centi-}} '''Cent''' may refer to: ==Currency== *[[Cent (currency)]], a one-hundredth subdivision of several units of currency *[[Cent (Canadian coin)]], a Canadian coin *[[Cent (Dutch WWII coin)]], the Dutch coin minted between 1941 and 1944 *[[Cent (Euro coin)]], a European coin *[[Cent (United States coin)]], a United States coin ==Measurement== *[[Cent (unit)]], an Indian measure of land *an alternative name for the '''point''', a unit of mass for gemstones equal to {{frac|100}} of a [[carat (unit)|carat]] *[[Cent (music)]], a logarithmic measure of relative pitch or intervals ==Locations== *[[Cents, Luxembourg]], a quarter of Luxembourg City, Luxembourg ==See also== *[[Percent]], 1 in 100 *[[Century]], 100 consecutive years ==References== <references/> {{disambig}}
